experiences.title: Packaged App Development Intern
experiences.description: Learning and implementing new concepts in AI, ML, and cloud computing to enhance application functionality. Exploring no-code/low-code platforms to streamline development processes and enhance productivity.

experiences.title: Project Intern
experiences.description: Designed a robust database structure for the Garage Management System using MySQL. Learned to create tables, define relationships, and optimize queries for efficient data handling. Gained insights into the end-to-end process flow of a garage management system.
